Class SingleThreadHttpServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • cloud.piranha.http.singlethread.SingleThreadHttpServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class SingleThreadHttpServer
extends Object
implements HttpServer, Runnable
    The single threaded implementation of HTTP Server.

    Manfred Riem (mriem@manorrock.com)
